problem_text_cn: 将一副直角三角板如图放置,使含60°角的三角板的直角边和含45°角的三角板的一条直角边重合,则∠1的度数为()
problem_text_en: Place a pair of right-angled triangular plates as shown in the figure, so that the right-angled edge of the triangular plate with angle N_0 and a right-angled edge of the triangular plate with angle N_1 coincide, then the degree of ∠1 is ()
